ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
0=Never or Rarely; 1=Sometimes; 2=Frequently or Always

ElementDescription: Has any gastrointestinal diagnosis been given?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 9 = Unknown

ElementDescription: "In the last 2 months, how often did your child usually have poops?"
ValueRange: 2 times a week or less often;3-6 times a week;Once a day;2-3 times a day; More than 3 times a day; I don't know

ElementDescription: "In the last 2 months, what was your child's poop usually like?"
ValueRange: Very hard;Hard;Not too hard and not too soft;Very soft or mushy;Watery;It depends (his/her poops are not always the same);I don't know

ElementDescription: "If your child's poops were usually hard, for how long have they been hard?"
ValueRange: Less than 1 month;1 month;2 months;3 or more months; I don't know

ElementDescription: Previous (> 3 mos ago): Any allergies to foods?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes

ElementDescription: Current (in past 3 mos): Any allergies to foods?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes

ElementDescription: Previous (> 3 mos ago): Any diet restrictions?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes
1=Child restricted diet
1=Doctor restricted the diet
1=Parent restricted the diet
1=Other restricted the diet

ElementDescription: IF YES: Reasons for previous diet restriction
Current (in past 3 mos): Any diet restrictions?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes
1=Child restricted diet
1=Doctor restricted the diet
1=Parent restricted the diet
1=Other restricted the diet

ElementDescription: IF YES: Reasons for current diet restriction
Previous (> 3 mos ago): Any strong food dislikes?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes

ElementDescription: Current (in past 3 mos): Any strong food dislikes?
Notes: 0=No ;1=Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Vomiting
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Uncomfortable feeling in the stomach or abdomen during/after a normal-sized meal
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Nausea or upset stomach after eating
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Nausea or stomach upset not related to food intake
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Pain in the stomach or abdomen
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Bloating or gas
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Constipation
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Loose stools or diarrhea
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Incomplete emptying of the bowels (feeling that stool cannot pass when emptying the bowels)
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Pain or pressure in the rectum or anus lasting > 20 minutes (not during bowel movement)
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often were you bothered by: Leakage of liquid or solid stool
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: How many days in the last 3 months have you missed work/school because of one or more of the above symptoms?
Notes: 0 = 0 days; 1 = 1-5 days; 2 = 6-10 days; 3 = 11-15 days; 4 = More than 15 days

ElementDescription: In the past 28 days, how often has your child been bothered by: Pain when swallowing
Notes: 0 = None of the days; 1 = Less than half the days; 2 = Half the days; 3 = More than half the days; 4 = Every or almost every day; -9 = Uncertain

ElementDescription: Bristol Stool Chart - choose the type that best describes the stool from your most recent bowel movement

e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime
